price: (163) No partner has He. And this I have been commanded, and I am the first [among you] of the Muslims."[361]
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: [361]- i.e., those who submit to the will of Allāh.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
